blog.name: piplupcola
blog.title: The Style-less Artist
blog.description:
Hullo I'm Pip! Just a peculiar girl with zero social media skills. 
Freshman at Ringling College of Art and Design || 3D Character Animator and Illustrator 
|| I like drawing and writing literary essays on my favorite shows and games || I might suck at art but I'm gonna damm well try

summary: Just in case anyone cares, with the tumblr apocalypse happening now, I just wanna mention that I'll still be continuing to use...
body:
Just in case anyone cares, with the tumblr apocalypse happening now, I just wanna mention that I’ll still be continuing to use tumblr to post my stuff.

I’m not good at social media, so Tumblr is like the only closest thing to social media ever I hang out on.

Hopefully it doesn’t crash and burn. But if it does, where should I move? Twitter? Instagram? Any ideas? Let me know :)

♡- pip

blog.name: lotwcomic
blog.title: Last of the wilds
blog.description:
The tragedy came on a day that no one could have expected. Fire tore through the gates, and rain of arrows dyed the innocent's blood with dark crimson. The Massacre happened and ended in a night. The Elven race was eradicated.

Yet, there is still a light of hope.

Last of the Wilds is a comic written and illustrated by Callus Ran (aka Ran196242), about those unfortunate souls, who dwelled within the Forest of the Unknowns in the darkest days of their life, brought upon by a power struggle between Men and Elves.


Warning: The series contains graphic depiction of fantasy violence and partial nudity, therefore unsuitable for some individuals under 13.

tags: Last of The Wilds webcomic LINEWEBTOON
summary: LAST OF THE WILDS’ CHAPTER 4 IS OUT NOW ON WEBTOONS, EVERYONE! Oh, at long last, I’m finally finished with the latest chapter!...
caption:
LAST OF THE WILDS’ CHAPTER 4 IS OUT NOW ON WEBTOONS, EVERYONE!

Oh, at long last, I’m finally finished with the latest chapter! Thank you all for your patience, waiting for this thing to even come out.

Since Tumblr is having a field day flagging everything left and right, I’m just going to post the first part here for preview.

summary: State of my art blog Hello to my twenty-some followers (Probably a lot less since I’m sure a few of you are bots). Thank you for...
caption:
State of my art blog

Hello to my twenty-some followers (Probably a lot less since I’m sure a few of you are bots). Thank you for following me for the past two years.

The tumblrgeddon isn’t directly effecting me. I have nothing flagged so far. I don’t plan on leaving the platform either.

If you do decide to abandon this platform, I would appreciate it if you follow my other social media sites. If any non-follower happens to see this post and enjoy my work, feel free to follow me both here and my other accounts.

My Instagram is @ gary_leung_art

My Twitter is @ gary_leung_art

My Wattpad for writing @ Gary_Leung_Writing

Please note, I recently changed my Twitter and Wattpad handle, if you can’t follow the link, just type my handles in the app.

summary: So Tumblr is now banning artists
title: So Tumblr is now banning artists
body:
So since it appears tumblr is now banning artists and illustrators that show “female-presenting nipples”, but can’t decide whether or not female nudity in illustrations are allowed or not.

Cuz, uh, “female-presenting nipples, and any content—including photos, videos, GIFs and illustrations” are banned, but “nudity found in art, such as sculptures and illustrations“ is allowed.

@staff make up your mind is nudity in art a horrific thing? Or is it perfectly Okay?

So good luck tumblr, when you eventually ban all your artists, but still want to keep your nazi fanbase, okay
